resources.string: The charging voltage is too high. Please disconnect the charger.
Your battery is overheating. Please remove the battery.
Overcurrent protection limit exceeded. Please remove the battery.
The battery voltage is too high. Please remove the battery.
The phone is charged for too long. Please disconnect the charger.
The battery temperature is too low. Please disconnect the charger.

The data service is limited due to the overheating of the communication module. If the overheating continues, the communication module will be shut down. Please move to a cool place with good signal, or turn off 4G in settings.
The overheating of the communication module is relieved. All the communication functions are restored.
